snippet: Wang Gongquan, a venture capitalist who has been outspoken in his liberal views, was detained by more than 20 officers from the Beijing police.
abstract: Wang Gongquan, Chinese venture capitalist who has been outspoken in his liberal views, is detained by more than 20 officers from the Beijing police; is accused of assembling a disorderly crowd, same charge that was issued against his friend, lawyer Xu Zhiyong, when he was arrested a month earlier.

byline.contributor: Patrick Zuo and Shi Da contributed research.

lead_paragraph: Wang Gongquan, a venture capitalist who has been outspoken in his liberal views, was detained by more than 20 officers from the Beijing police.

headline.main: China Detains a Billionaire for Activism
headline.print_headline: China Detains A Billionaire For Activism

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
